overview: In this short documentary Alfonso Moreno is given the challenge to enter the world of drag. Moreno attempts to discover what it's all about and what it takes to be a Queen. Thinking, 'How hard could this be?' Alfonso quickly immerses himself into the world of drag. After his first show he starts to change his tune, realizing that being a Queen is way more than just a wig and makeup.
title: Life's a Drag
